Sentencas: The triple phase boundary (TPB) of metal, oxide, and gas phases in the anode of solid oxide fuel cells plays an important role in determining their performance.
Titulo: Atomic structure observations and reaction dynamics simulations on triple phase boundaries in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Here we explore the TPB structures from two aspects: atomic-resolution microscopy observation and reaction dynamics simulation.
Titulo: Atomic structure observations and reaction dynamics simulations on triple phase boundaries in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Experimentally, two distinct structures are found with different contact angles of metal/oxide interfaces, metal surfaces, and pore opening sizes, which have not previously been adopted in simulations.
Titulo: Atomic structure observations and reaction dynamics simulations on triple phase boundaries in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Reaction dynamics simulations are performed using realistic models for the hydrogen oxidation reaction (HOR) at the TPB, based on extensive development of reactive force field parameters.
Titulo: Atomic structure observations and reaction dynamics simulations on triple phase boundaries in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As a result, the activity of different structures towards HOR is clarified, and a higher activity is obtained on the TPB with smaller pore opening size.
Titulo: Atomic structure observations and reaction dynamics simulations on triple phase boundaries in solid-oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Three HOR pathways are identified: two types of hydrogen diffusion processes, and one type of oxygen migration process which is a new pathway.
Titulo: Atomic structure observations and reaction dynamics simulations on triple phase boundaries in solid-oxide fuel cells
